summary: Changes all female bards to male versions.
descriptionHtml:
Reasons behind this mod: first, it came out of frustration with poorly sang female songs in Skyrim. These songs sound false as hell.
Second - I did not like Windhelm's default bard - Luaffyn. Damn gray skin stinker (and yeah, a female dunmer singing stormcloak songs is all the definition of a hypocrisy). So I changed her into this guy.

This is the first installment, beta stage.
I present you Harald Blood-Spiller, staunch supporter of Stormcloaks and a great bard. Hope you will like him.
This mod is in beta phase, hope there won't be any problems with that guy.

Disclaimer: I know there are some mods that change female songs to Malukah's creations. Well, I do respect her achievements and I think she is a great singer, altough these ooooohs and aaaahs do not befit the songs of Skyrim, because these are songs about blood, steel and war. And warriors rather ROAR than oooooh. ;)

Don't like - don't download, simple as that.

Bugs:
none! please report if you find any.

changelog:

0.9a
-small bugfix update.

0.9
-initial release.
-Luaffyn is now Harald Blood-Spiller.
author: WarlordThorvald
